synopsis: Specials of Luo Xiao Hei Zhan Ji that have new animation but do not have a standard episode number.First is with students cheating on their final exam, it aired between CAT.2 and CAT.3.Second is CAT8.5, an official parody episode.Third is a music video that aired between CAT.10 and CAT.11.Fourth is a music video that aired between CAT.24 and CAT.25.

title.jp: Luo Xiao Hei Zhan Ji: Fan Wai
